description:
single-stack <info>Ronson</info> <color_yellow>magazine</color>, colored black with a sleek metal finish.
Ronson's logo is printed on the side of the magazine and will probably only work with Ronson's weapons.

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
